nodes.text: Raydonia was a planet in the Outer Rim Territories. The Human colonists who lived there were known as Raydonians.

Raydonia was similar to Felucia in size, color (blue-green), and being completely covered with flora and fauna and overgrown with life. Its sky was filled with crimson clouds, similar to Dathomir's sky.
Some time around 20 BBY, there was a skirmish above the planet. Sith Lord Darth Maul and his brother Savage Opress fought against Obi-Wan Kenobi and Asajj Ventress, aboard a Turtle Tanker.
